verses.text: \w By|strong="H3117"\w* \w now|strong="H3117"\w* Abraham \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w old|strong="H2204"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* well along \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w years|strong="H3117"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w blessed|strong="H1288"\w* \w him|strong="H3605"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w way|strong="H3605"\w*.

\w So|strong="H7760"\w* Abraham instructed \w the|strong="H3605"\w* chief \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w household|strong="H1004"\w*, \w who|strong="H3605"\w* managed \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w he|strong="H3605"\w* owned, “\w Place|strong="H8478"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w under|strong="H8478"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w thigh|strong="H3409"\w*,

\w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H3947"\w* \w swear|strong="H7650"\w* \w by|strong="H7650"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w earth|strong="H8064"\w*, \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H3947"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w take|strong="H3947"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* wife \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w from|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w Canaanites|strong="H3669"\w* \w among|strong="H7130"\w* whom \w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w am|strong="H3068"\w* \w dwelling|strong="H3427"\w*,

\w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H1121"\w* \w go|strong="H3212"\w* \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w my|strong="H3947"\w* country \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w my|strong="H3947"\w* \w kindred|strong="H4138"\w* \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w take|strong="H3947"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* wife \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w my|strong="H3947"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w Isaac|strong="H3327"\w*.”

\w The|strong="H7725"\w* \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* asked \w him|strong="H7725"\w*, “\w What|strong="H2063"\w* \w if|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H7725"\w* woman \w is|strong="H1121"\w* \w unwilling|strong="H3808"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w follow|strong="H3212"\w* \w me|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w* land? \w Shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w I|strong="H5650"\w* \w then|strong="H3318"\w* \w take|strong="H7725"\w* \w your|strong="H7725"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w back|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H7725"\w* land \w from|strong="H7725"\w* \w which|strong="H8033"\w* \w you|strong="H7725"\w* \w came|strong="H3318"\w*?”

Abraham replied, “\w Make|strong="H7725"\w* \w sure|strong="H8104"\w* \w that|strong="H1121"\w* \w you|strong="H7725"\w* \w do|strong="H8104"\w* \w not|strong="H6435"\w* \w take|strong="H7725"\w* \w my|strong="H8104"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w back|strong="H7725"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w*.

\w The|strong="H6440"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w*, \w who|strong="H1931"\w* \w brought|strong="H3947"\w* \w me|strong="H5414"\w* \w from|strong="H6440"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* \w father|strong="H1121"\w*’s \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* \w native|strong="H4138"\w* \w land|strong="H6440"\w*, \w who|strong="H1931"\w* \w spoke|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w me|strong="H5414"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w promised|strong="H1696"\w* \w me|strong="H5414"\w* \w on|strong="H3068"\w* \w oath|strong="H7650"\w*, \w saying|strong="H1696"\w*, ‘\w To|strong="H1696"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w offspring|strong="H2233"\w* \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w* \w land|strong="H6440"\w*’—\w He|strong="H1931"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w send|strong="H7971"\w* \w His|strong="H5414"\w* \w angel|strong="H4397"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w* \w so|strong="H3947"\w* \w that|strong="H1931"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w* \w can|strong="H3947"\w* \w take|strong="H3947"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w wife|strong="H1696"\w* \w for|strong="H6440"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w from|strong="H6440"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w if|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H7725"\w* woman \w is|strong="H1121"\w* \w unwilling|strong="H3808"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w follow|strong="H3212"\w* \w you|strong="H7725"\w*, \w then|strong="H7725"\w* \w you|strong="H7725"\w* \w are|strong="H1121"\w* released \w from|strong="H7725"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w* \w oath|strong="H7621"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w mine|strong="H7725"\w*. \w Only|strong="H7535"\w* do \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w take|strong="H7725"\w* \w my|strong="H7725"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w back|strong="H7725"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w*.”

\w So|strong="H2088"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* \w placed|strong="H7760"\w* \w his|strong="H7760"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w under|strong="H8478"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w thigh|strong="H3409"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w his|strong="H7760"\w* master Abraham \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w swore|strong="H7650"\w* \w an|strong="H7760"\w* \w oath|strong="H7650"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w concerning|strong="H5921"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w matter|strong="H1697"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H6965"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w ten|strong="H6235"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* master’s \w camels|strong="H1581"\w* \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w departed|strong="H3212"\w* \w with|strong="H3212"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w manner|strong="H3605"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w good|strong="H2898"\w* \w things|strong="H3605"\w* \w from|strong="H3027"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* master \w in|strong="H3212"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*. \w And|strong="H6965"\w* \w he|strong="H3605"\w* \w set|strong="H6965"\w* \w out|strong="H3947"\w* \w for|strong="H3027"\w* \w Nahor|strong="H5152"\w*’s hometown \w in|strong="H3212"\w* Aram-naharaim.\f + \fr 24:10 \ft That is, Mesopotamia; Aram-naharaim means Aram of the two rivers, likely the region between the Euphrates and Balih Rivers in northwestern Mesopotamia.\f*

\w As|strong="H3318"\w* \w evening|strong="H6153"\w* approached, \w he|strong="H6256"\w* \w made|strong="H1288"\w* \w the|strong="H1288"\w* \w camels|strong="H1581"\w* \w kneel|strong="H1288"\w* \w down|strong="H1288"\w* near \w the|strong="H1288"\w* well \w outside|strong="H2351"\w* \w the|strong="H1288"\w* \w town|strong="H5892"\w* \w at|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H1288"\w* \w time|strong="H6256"\w* \w when|strong="H6256"\w* \w the|strong="H1288"\w* women \w went|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w draw|strong="H7579"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w*.

“\w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* master Abraham,” \w he|strong="H3117"\w* \w prayed|strong="H4994"\w*, “\w please|strong="H4994"\w* \w grant|strong="H4994"\w* \w me|strong="H6440"\w* \w success|strong="H7136"\w* \w today|strong="H3117"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w show|strong="H6213"\w* \w kindness|strong="H2617"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* master Abraham.

\w Here|strong="H2009"\w* \w I|strong="H2009"\w* am, \w standing|strong="H5324"\w* \w beside|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w spring|strong="H3318"\w*, \w and|strong="H5869"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w* \w of|strong="H1323"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* townspeople \w are|strong="H5869"\w* \w coming|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w draw|strong="H7579"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w*.

\w Now|strong="H4994"\w* \w may|strong="H1961"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w happen|strong="H1961"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w girl|strong="H5291"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w whom|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* say, ‘\w Please|strong="H4994"\w* \w let|strong="H4994"\w* \w down|strong="H5186"\w* \w your|strong="H5186"\w* \w jar|strong="H3537"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w may|strong="H1961"\w* \w drink|strong="H8354"\w*,’ \w and|strong="H5650"\w* \w who|strong="H5650"\w* responds, ‘\w Drink|strong="H8354"\w*, \w and|strong="H5650"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w water|strong="H8248"\w* \w your|strong="H5186"\w* \w camels|strong="H1581"\w* \w as|strong="H1961"\w* \w well|strong="H1571"\w*’—\w let|strong="H4994"\w* \w her|strong="H3045"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w one|strong="H1961"\w* \w You|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w appointed|strong="H3198"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w Your|strong="H5186"\w* \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* \w Isaac|strong="H3327"\w*. \w By|strong="H1571"\w* \w this|strong="H6213"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w You|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w shown|strong="H6213"\w* \w kindness|strong="H2617"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w my|strong="H3045"\w* master.” Rebekah Is Chosen

\w Before|strong="H2962"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* servant \w had|strong="H1961"\w* \w finished|strong="H3615"\w* \w praying|strong="H1696"\w*, \w Rebekah|strong="H7259"\w* \w came|strong="H1961"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w with|strong="H1696"\w* \w her|strong="H5921"\w* \w jar|strong="H3537"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w her|strong="H5921"\w* \w shoulder|strong="H7926"\w*. \w She|strong="H1931"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* daughter \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Bethuel|strong="H1328"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Milcah|strong="H4435"\w*, \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w wife|strong="H1696"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Abraham’s brother \w Nahor|strong="H5152"\w*.

Now \w the|strong="H3045"\w* \w girl|strong="H5291"\w* \w was|strong="H3966"\w* \w very|strong="H3966"\w* \w beautiful|strong="H2896"\w*, \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w virgin|strong="H1330"\w* \w who|strong="H2896"\w* \w had|strong="H3045"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w had|strong="H3045"\w* \w relations|strong="H3045"\w* \w with|strong="H4390"\w* \w any|strong="H5927"\w* \w man|strong="H2896"\w*. \w She|strong="H3808"\w* \w went|strong="H5927"\w* \w down|strong="H3381"\w* \w to|strong="H3381"\w* \w the|strong="H3045"\w* \w spring|strong="H5927"\w*, \w filled|strong="H4390"\w* \w her|strong="H4390"\w* \w jar|strong="H3537"\w*, \w and|strong="H5869"\w* \w came|strong="H5927"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* again.

\w So|strong="H4592"\w* \w the|strong="H5650"\w* \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* \w ran|strong="H7323"\w* \w to|strong="H4325"\w* \w meet|strong="H7125"\w* \w her|strong="H7125"\w* \w and|strong="H5650"\w* said, “\w Please|strong="H4994"\w* \w let|strong="H4994"\w* \w me|strong="H4994"\w* \w have|strong="H5650"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w little|strong="H4592"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w* \w from|strong="H5650"\w* \w your|strong="H4994"\w* \w jar|strong="H3537"\w*.”

“\w Drink|strong="H8354"\w*, \w my|strong="H5921"\w* lord,” \w she|strong="H8248"\w* replied, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w she|strong="H8248"\w* \w quickly|strong="H4116"\w* \w lowered|strong="H3381"\w* \w her|strong="H5921"\w* \w jar|strong="H3537"\w* \w to|strong="H3381"\w* \w her|strong="H5921"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w gave|strong="H8248"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w drink|strong="H8354"\w*.

\w After|strong="H5704"\w* \w she|strong="H8248"\w* \w had|strong="H1581"\w* \w given|strong="H8248"\w* \w him|strong="H8248"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w drink|strong="H8354"\w*, \w she|strong="H8248"\w* said, “\w I|strong="H5704"\w* \w will|strong="H1571"\w* \w also|strong="H1571"\w* \w draw|strong="H7579"\w* \w water|strong="H8248"\w* \w for|strong="H5704"\w* \w your|strong="H5704"\w* \w camels|strong="H1581"\w*, \w until|strong="H5704"\w* \w they|strong="H5704"\w* \w have|strong="H1571"\w* \w had|strong="H1581"\w* \w enough|strong="H1571"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w drink|strong="H8354"\w*.”

\w And|strong="H4116"\w* she \w quickly|strong="H4116"\w* \w emptied|strong="H6168"\w* \w her|strong="H3605"\w* \w jar|strong="H3537"\w* into \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w trough|strong="H8268"\w* \w and|strong="H4116"\w* \w ran|strong="H7323"\w* \w back|strong="H5750"\w* \w to|strong="H7323"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* well \w to|strong="H7323"\w* \w draw|strong="H7579"\w* \w water|strong="H7579"\w*, until she \w had|strong="H1581"\w* \w drawn|strong="H7579"\w* \w water|strong="H7579"\w* \w for|strong="H3605"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w camels|strong="H1581"\w*.

Meanwhile, \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w man|strong="H3045"\w* watched \w her|strong="H3045"\w* \w silently|strong="H7583"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w see|strong="H3045"\w* \w whether|strong="H3045"\w* \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w made|strong="H3045"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w journey|strong="H1870"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w success|strong="H6743"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3027"\w* \w after|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w camels|strong="H1581"\w* \w had|strong="H1961"\w* \w finished|strong="H3615"\w* \w drinking|strong="H8354"\w*, \w he|strong="H8147"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w out|strong="H3947"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w* \w ring|strong="H5141"\w* \w weighing|strong="H4948"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w beka|strong="H1235"\w*,\f + \fr 24:22 \ft A beka is half a shekel, or approximately 0.2 ounces or 5.7 grams.\f* \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w* \w bracelets|strong="H6781"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w her|strong="H3947"\w* \w wrists|strong="H3027"\w* \w weighing|strong="H4948"\w* \w ten|strong="H6235"\w* \w shekels|strong="H4948"\w*.\f + \fr 24:22 \ft 10 shekels is approximately 4 ounces or 114 grams.\f*

“\w Whose|strong="H4310"\w* \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* \w are|strong="H3426"\w* \w you|strong="H5046"\w*?” \w he|strong="H1004"\w* asked. “\w Please|strong="H4994"\w* \w tell|strong="H5046"\w* \w me|strong="H4994"\w*, \w is|strong="H3426"\w* \w there|strong="H3426"\w* \w room|strong="H1004"\w* \w in|strong="H1004"\w* \w your|strong="H4994"\w* father’s \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w for|strong="H1004"\w* \w us|strong="H4994"\w* \w to|strong="H1004"\w* \w spend|strong="H3885"\w* \w the|strong="H5046"\w* \w night|strong="H3885"\w*?”

She replied, “\w I|strong="H1121"\w* am \w the|strong="H3205"\w* \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Bethuel|strong="H1328"\w*, \w the|strong="H3205"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w that|strong="H1121"\w* \w Milcah|strong="H4435"\w* \w bore|strong="H3205"\w* \w to|strong="H3205"\w* \w Nahor|strong="H5152"\w*.”

\w Then|strong="H1571"\w* \w she|strong="H5973"\w* added, “We \w have|strong="H1571"\w* \w plenty|strong="H7227"\w* \w of|strong="H4725"\w* \w straw|strong="H8401"\w* \w and|strong="H4725"\w* \w feed|strong="H4554"\w*, \w as|strong="H1571"\w* \w well|strong="H1571"\w* \w as|strong="H1571"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w place|strong="H4725"\w* \w for|strong="H4725"\w* \w you|strong="H5973"\w* \w to|strong="H5973"\w* \w spend|strong="H3885"\w* \w the|strong="H1571"\w* \w night|strong="H3885"\w*.”

\w Then|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* man \w bowed|strong="H7812"\w* \w down|strong="H7812"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w worshiped|strong="H7812"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*,

saying, “\w Blessed|strong="H1288"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* master Abraham, \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* withheld \w His|strong="H3068"\w* \w kindness|strong="H2617"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w faithfulness|strong="H2617"\w* \w from|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* master. \w As|strong="H3068"\w* \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H1288"\w*, \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w led|strong="H5148"\w* \w me|strong="H1288"\w* \w on|strong="H1870"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w journey|strong="H1870"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* master’s relatives.”
